body_html: We probably don't have time for this right now. I'm not certain if this could be implemented in portable way. POSIX.2 libc regex probably isn't available on Windows. @vrv has mentioned in the past we've encountered portability issues with RE2. If I see more community support for this, I'll reopen.

body: We probably don't have time for this right now. I'm not certain if this could be implemented in portable way. POSIX.2 libc regex probably isn't available on Windows. @vrv has mentioned in the past we've encountered portability issues with RE2. If I see more community support for this, I'll reopen.
